titles.text: משמרת הבית על תורת הבית הארוך
Mishmeret HaBayit on Torat HaBayit HaAroch

schema.key: Mishmeret HaBayit on Torat HaBayit HaAroch

enDesc: Mishmeret HaBayit is the Rashba’s response to Ra’ah’s critique of his work, Torat HaBayit HaKatzar. Ra’ah’s critique is called Bedek HaBayit.
enShortDesc: 13th-century response of the Rashba to Bedek HaBayit, the Re’ah’s critique of the Rashba’s Torat HaBayit.
